title: Taylor's Many Meanings With The Color Blue!
description:
Taylor likes to paint pictures with her lyrics and the colors that she uses has many different meanings. Nick Adams blew (haha) our minds when he explained how she used the word 'blue' in Cruel Summer, so we decided to do a deep dive into every song and every meaning with that specific color. Some are simple, some are complex.. Ana, Lacey, Nick and Amy discuss it all!
What did we miss? What would you like for us to cover? Let us know!
